reviewText: The French are excellent in making movies that look like a book you read. Realistic and emotional. This is a perfect example. The story evolves around a divorced man in love with a stranger, Married sister, not sure about her happiness, their mother and many other fantastic characters. Surely worth watching. recommended

Somewhere in province, strangers live their lives while returning home young manipulative man united their separate existences in a story of sex and inter-relations.

A very French mix of sex, life, desire and entertainment.
